entries: The <name> is dedicated to protecting another creature, known as its charge. If it has no assigned charge when it rolls {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB}, the DM may choose to assign one from the friendly creatures it can see or hear. When the <name> rolls {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB}, it can change its initiative to be immediately before or after its charge.
Additionally, while within 5 feet of the bodyguard, the charge can use the {@action Dodge|XPHB} or {@action Disengage|XPHB} action as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}.
{@atkr mw, rw} <hit_default>, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target <dmg_medium> piercing damage.
When a creature the <name> can see within 5 feet is targeted by an attack or forced to make a Strength or Dextrity saving throw, the <name> can force the attack or save to target itself instead.

When a creature the <name> can see within 5 feet is targeted by an attack or forced to make a Strength or Dextrity saving throw, the <name> can force the attack or save to target itself instead. The <name> has a +<mod_scale1> bonus to their Armor Class or saving throw for this reaction.
